trans-unit.source: Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: Démarrage de Windows PowerShell sur des versions antérieures de Windows

trans-unit.source: Starting Windows PowerShell on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: Démarrage de Windows PowerShell sur des versions antérieures de Windows

trans-unit.source: This section explains how to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Cette section explique comment démarrer [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)] sur [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: It also explains how to enable the optional feature for [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Elle explique également comment activer la fonctionnalité facultative pour [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] dans [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] sur [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] on supported systems, download and install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881).
trans-unit.target: Pour installer [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] sur des systèmes pris en charge, téléchargez et installez [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=293881).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Installing Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, voir [Installation de Windows Server](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).

trans-unit.source: To install [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] on supported systems, download and install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).
trans-unit.target: Pour installer [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] sur des systèmes pris en charge, téléchargez et installez [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=240290).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Installing Windows PowerShell](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, voir [Installation de Windows Server](../Topic/Installing-Windows-PowerShell.md).

trans-unit.source: How to Start [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] on Earlier Versions of Windows
trans-unit.target: Comment démarrer [!INCLUDE[mshshort](../Token/mshshort_md.md)] sur des versions antérieures de Windows

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following methods to start the installed version of [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], where applicable.
trans-unit.target: Pour démarrer la version installée de [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], le cas échéant, utilisez une des méthodes suivantes.

trans-unit.source: From the Start Menu
trans-unit.target: À partir du menu Démarrer

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **PowerShell**, and then click **Windows PowerShell**.
trans-unit.target: Cliquez sur **Démarrer**, tapez **PowerShell**, puis cliquez sur **Windows PowerShell**.

trans-unit.source: From the **Start** menu, click **Start**, click **All Programs**, click **Accessories**, click the **Windows PowerShell** folder, and then click **Windows PowerShell**.
trans-unit.target: À partir du menu **Démarrer**, cliquez sur **Démarrer**, **Tous les programmes**, **Accessoires**, cliquez sur le dossier **Windows PowerShell**, puis sur **Windows PowerShell**.

trans-unit.source: At the Command Prompt
trans-unit.target: À l’invite de commandes

trans-unit.source: In Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], type:
trans-unit.target: Dans Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, pour démarrer [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], tapez :

trans-unit.source: You can also use the parameters of the PowerShell.exe program to customize the session.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez également utiliser les paramètres du programme PowerShell.exe pour personnaliser la session.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [PowerShell.exe Command-Line Help](../Topic/PowerShell.exe-Command-Line-Help.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations, voir [Aide sur la ligne de commande PowerShell.exe](../Topic/PowerShell.exe-Command-Line-Help.md).

trans-unit.source: With Administrative privileges ("Run as administrator")
trans-unit.target: Avec des privilèges d’administration (« Exécuter en tant qu’administrateur »)

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **PowerShell**, right\-click **Windows PowerShell**, and then click **Run as administrator**.
trans-unit.target: Cliquez sur **Démarrer**, tapez **PowerShell**, cliquez avec le bouton droit sur **Windows PowerShell**, puis cliquez sur **Exécuter en tant qu’administrateur**.

trans-unit.source: How to Start [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] on Earlier Releases of Windows
trans-unit.target: Comment démarrer [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] sur des versions antérieures de Windows

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following methods to start [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Pour démarrer [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)], utilisez l’une des méthodes suivantes.

trans-unit.source: From the Start Menu
trans-unit.target: À partir du menu Démarrer

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **ISE**, and then click **Windows PowerShell ISE**.
trans-unit.target: Cliquez sur **Démarrer**, tapez **ISE**, puis cliquez sur **Windows PowerShell ISE**.

trans-unit.source: From the **Start** menu, click **Start**, click **All Programs**, click **Accessories**, click the **Windows PowerShell** folder, and then click **Windows PowerShell ISE**.
trans-unit.target: À partir du menu **Démarrer**, cliquez sur **Démarrer**, **Tous les programmes**, **Accessoires**, cliquez sur le dossier **Windows PowerShell**, puis sur **Windows PowerShell ISE**.

trans-unit.source: At the Command Prompt
trans-unit.target: À l’invite de commandes

trans-unit.source: In Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], or [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, to start [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], type:
trans-unit.target: Dans Cmd.exe, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] ISE, pour démarrer [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)], tapez :

trans-unit.source: or
trans-unit.target: ou

trans-unit.source: With Administrative privileges ("Run as administrator")
trans-unit.target: Avec des privilèges d’administration (« Exécuter en tant qu’administrateur »)

trans-unit.source: Click **Start**, type **ISE**, right\-click **Windows PowerShell ISE**, and then click **Run as administrator**.
trans-unit.target: Cliquez sur **Démarrer**, tapez **ISE**, cliquez avec le bouton droit sur **Windows PowerShell ISE**, puis cliquez sur **Exécuter en tant qu’administrateur**.

trans-unit.source: How to Enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] on Earlier Releases of Windows
trans-unit.target: Comment activer [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] sur des versions antérieures de Windows

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] is enabled by default on all versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Dans [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] est activé par défaut sur toutes les versions de Windows.

trans-unit.source: If it is not already enabled, Windows Management Framework 4.0 or [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] enables it.
trans-unit.target: S’il n’est pas activé, Windows Management Framework 4.0 ou [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)] l’active.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] is enabled by default on [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Dans [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] est activé par défaut sur [!INCLUDE[win7_client_secondref](../Token/win7_client_secondref_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], it is an optional feature.
trans-unit.target: Toutefois, sur [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] et [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], il s’agit d’une fonctionnalité facultative.

trans-unit.source: To enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] on [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], use the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: Pour activer [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhostshort](../Token/mshgraphicalhostshort_md.md)] dans [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] sur [!INCLUDE[win7_server_secondref](../Token/win7_server_secondref_md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)], procédez comme suit.

trans-unit.source: To enable [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: Pour activer [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Start Server Manager.
trans-unit.target: Démarrez le Gestionnaire de serveur.

trans-unit.source: Click **Features** and then click **Add Features**.
trans-unit.target: Cliquez sur **Fonctionnalités**, puis sur **Ajouter des fonctionnalités**.

trans-unit.source: In Select Features, click [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Dans Sélectionner des fonctionnalités, cliquez sur [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)].
